summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear implemented (logo path updated in SiteHeader and LandingPage hero; index.html favicon/apple-touch-icon/og:image tags updated). REQ-1 (actual generated image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated) is not evidenced in the diff summary. Several unrelated UI/content/feature changes are described in frontend-file-summaries.txt but were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create resized logo asset set under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames (kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png, kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png, kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png, kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png), derived from the uploaded image and properly centered/padded.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff summary shows no added files (Added: 0) and does not list any new static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence/creation of the required images is not evidenced.
evidence: frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx (references /assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png but does not add it)
frontend/index.html (references generated favicon/apple-touch/og assets but does not add them)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure there are no remaining references to "/assets/generated/controller-logo.dim_512x512.png" used for the brand logo in header/hero after the update.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows updates in SiteHeader and LandingPage, but the provided diff summary is truncated and does not include a repo-wide search/result proving the old path is fully eliminated everywhere it might be referenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed ServiceRequestPage behavior/options (e.g., controller platform dropdown now only Xbox/PlayStation/Other; services selection and total calculation; client-side reference images).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is limited to replacing logo assets/usages and updating head metadata, with a constraint to keep backend logic unchanged and no other UI/copy changes beyond logo display.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified SiteFooter copy ("K's Lab Customization" and caffeine.ai attribution).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal explicitly says not to change app name/subtitle/other copy; footer copy change is unrelated to logo asset replacement.

hallucinated_features.description: AdminRequestDetailPage changes (display-only price updates pending backend support) and related admin UI behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly says keep all backend logic unchanged and focuses only on frontend/static-asset logo updates.

hallucinated_features.description: NotesPanel change regarding enum casting when submitting notes to the backend.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and violates the spirit of "logo update is frontend/static-asset only" by altering backend-interaction details (even if only in frontend code).

hallucinated_features.description: Updates/additions to React Query hooks for backend operations (aliases, request creation fields, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; beyond logo replacement scope and relates to backend operations integration.

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed client-side reference image upload hook.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside logo replacement and head metadata updates.
